QuestData.Title: A Heartfelt Search
QuestData.Description: I can feel a powerful presence in the marsh $p. I feel drawn to it. We must go and take what is there. Go on ahead, I must finish consuming these mushrooms.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the strange presence at Crimson Fen.
QuestData.RewardText: We are so close I can almost touch it! We will have to go deeper, much deeper!
